subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Sidney Crosby scored a goal and set up two by Evgeni Malkin in the third period to help the Pittsburgh Penguins rally for a 5-3 win against the Islanders.
snippet: Sidney Crosby scored a goal and set up two by Evgeni Malkin in the third period to help the Pittsburgh Penguins rally for a 5-3 win against the Islanders.
